providedIdentifier.description: Email OR ID of the contact, if not present the contact will be inserted, it will be used to search the contact, if it can be found the contact will be updated else it will be inserted

email.description: To either be inserted or updated

name: sendinblue-send-transactional-email
description: Send transactional email. [See the docs](https://developers.sendinblue.com/reference/sendtransacemail) for more information.
